welcome_message_body: Welcome to Portsmouth, where historic charm meets coastal beauty! Enjoy exploring our charming downtown, picturesque waterfront, and rich maritime history. We hope you have a wonderful time discovering all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Jax Diner
restaurants.description: Jax Diner is a diner located in Portsmouth.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pease International Airport is a modern and efficient facility, offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pease International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations, providing a convenient and secure location for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sanford Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sanford Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport handles all freight and mail shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
